p: In the two combination treatments, glyphosate was combined with pine oil (vi), mulch (vii) and seeding (viii), pine oil was combined with mulch, (ix), and seeding (x), and mulch was combined with seeds (xi). In the three combination treatments, glyphosate was applied with pine oil and mulch (xii), pine oil and seeding (xiii), mulch and seeding (xiv) and pine oil was applied with mulch and seeding (xv). In the four combination treatment, all treatments were combined; glyphosate, pine oil, mulch and seeding (xvi). All treatments were completed by early- to mid-May 2014.
